content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Easy puzzle for people learning a new language.
Everything clear to solve

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: On peut comprendre rapidement et coder rapidement sans pour autant que l'implémentation soit si évidente
Sympa pour un débutant, peut-être trop simple quand même est revoir les tests, il y a des doublons

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: La solution est simple mais il faut tout de même rester concentré. Je trouve qu'il a ça place pour une épreuve de rapidité.

❌ Rejected the contribution.
Comment: Not that interesting. Description is quite wordy to do such a simple task

The solution is not too complicated to find but the explanation is a little vague. Wouldn't it be possible to simplify the statement or make it clearer?
Cheers

Hi,

In my opinion, the description of the problem seems a bit too long for a solution that is too simple. Also, I'm not a big fan of the fact that the vote is not an act of choice.
Maybe turning the problem in some king of weighted vote would be better.

"Given the votes of the rest of the quorum and their wieght (list of int), what is the vote and the needed weight for your vote to change the final decision ?"

Something like that would be more interesting, I think.

Cheers

Binary Output issue
* According to the contribution guidelines, binary output should be avoided for clashes. Please change the output requirement so that there are more than 2 possible answers in total.
https://www.codingame.com/playgrounds/40701/help-center/contribution-guidelines

Goal & Output sections
* Please format "Yes" and "No" as {{constants}} instead of [[variables]].

Output section
* Please format "your_vote" as a [[variable]] instead of a {{constant}}.

Input & Output sections
* Please change "Ligne" to "Line".

Thanks.

Hello,
Thank you for the clarification.
Changes made.

Cordially
